channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.description: The goal is to get clear or get out of the way.

item.title: 3 New Year’s Resolutions for People Who Are Done With Hustle Culture
item.description: Hustle culture is not sustainable. Start the new year afresh with these intentional resolutions.

item.title: Forget Work-Life Balance. Here’s Why Entrepreneurs Must Integrate Business and Family
item.description: Integrate, don’t separate. Bye, bye work-life balance. Hello, work-life choice.

item.description: Trump says American oil companies will rebuild the Venezuelan industry and take a "tremendous amount of wealth out of the ground."
